name: The Golem Cuirass
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has awesome armour class for its type (excellent in general).
It increases the users physical resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
The Golem Cuirass grants its wearer immunity to poisons and diseases.
